name: Perona (Pre-Timeskip) | One Piece
description:
Pre-Timeskip Perona Character LoRA!


Making models can be time consuming and expensive. If you like what I do consider buying me a borgar🍔!

My first attempt at Lora training, any feedback is very appreciated!
A weight of 0.9-1.1 is recommended, though generally I believe that 1.0 gives the most consistent results (by a very small margin).

The trigger prompt is cheems_perona_v3.
Adding "red capelet, pink bowtie, striped pantyhose, crop top, red skirt and red boots" to the positive prompts will aid in consistency of her pre timeskip outfit, and the trigger words disc-shaped eyes, black eyes will get you her eye style.

If you want to see her with her parasol, you can achieve that with the prompt red umbrella.

Since this is a first pass/first try with the dataset ive precured, there is a bit of noise with the hair and some other elements - these can usually be washed out with the prompt simple background or some inpainting.
You can also add her ghosts with the ghost tag.

The examples shown above were generated with the hires fix function, with these settings:
Denoising strength: 0.6,

Clip skip: 2,

Hires upscale: 2,

Hires steps: 30,

Hires upscaler: Latent

Look forward to improved versions of this lora in the future, and give me some more suggestions of under-loved One Piece characters!

modelVersions.name: v3
modelVersions.description:
Changed the trigger word, resulted in much more accurate results and a much better homage to the cartoonish one piece Perona style.
You will want to describe her clothes to get even better results with her pre-timeskip outfit. These include: red capelet, red skirt, white crop top, crown, striped thighhighs, red boots

modelVersions.name: v2.0
modelVersions.description:
I trained this version on AbyssOrangeMix3 (AOM3) - and there is a much more concise representation of Perona's pre-timeskip outfit/style as well as her eye style/shape.
I would recommend using a weight of 0.9-1.1, and using the prompts disc-shaped eyes, black eyes to recreate her eye style, and pink hair because on some occasions you may get white or strawberry blonde hair.

If you're still having trouble getting her outfit, it helps to use the prompts red capelet, red skirt, striped pantyhose, white crop top, red boots
Also, this version is very good with NSFW generations.
